title: James A Garfield National Historic Site: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger         Cover of the Junior Ranger Book at James A. Garfield NHS NPS Staff  Kids ages 4-12 are invited to become Junior Rangers! Just ask the ranger or volunteer at the Front Desk for a book when you arrive, and start your quest to earn a Junior Ranger badge and pencil! Check back here soon for a PDF of the book, so you can print it out before your visit!
